metadata.title: CVE-2019-3860 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An out of bounds read flaw was discovered in libssh2 before 1.8.1 in theway SFTP packets with empty payloads are parsed. A remote attacker whocompromises a SSH server may be able to cause a Denial of Service or readdata in the client memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssh2-1 - 1.5.0-2ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libssh2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.0-2ubuntu0.1+esm1').
